title: Cursed Images Through the Web
text:
filename , cursed image About 
Cursed Images are images that are captioned with the phrase “Cursed Image.” They are generally pictures or photographs that are seen a disturbing to the viewer, either due to the poor photo quality, which may be seen as creepy, or content within the image that is abnormal or illogical. Images of this or similar nature are sometimes seen as the visual equivalent to CreepyPasta . They have inspired several popular social media accounts devoted to posting various cursed images. Origin 
The idea of cursed images initially started on Tumblr , and the first account to publish exclusively cursed images was CursedImages. [3] On October 28th, 2015, they published their first post. The image, shown below, gained over 1,200 notes. Spread 
The idea of Cursed Images spread outside of Tumblr when the Twitter account devoted to posting such pictures launched in July of 2016. @cursedimages [1] uploaded its first post on July 29th and gained over 100,000 followers in four months before gong dormant. The success of the Twitter account drew media attention from New York Magazine, [4] The New Yorker, [5] Gizmodo, [6] and more. Various Examples
